channel.title: Weapon models don't show
channel.description:
The first person weapon models don't show / render for me. I see this with the crowbar and pistol, as that is how far I've progressed in the game. To further test the glitch, I used the sv_cheats 1 and impulse 101 commands to attain all weapons, and the others don't to display a model either. Also, certain weapon sounds do not play, such as the reload sfx for the pistol.
I'm playing the game in Windows XP running via bootcamp on a late 2009 iMac.

item.title: Weapon models don't show
item.dc:creator: Buddy-Matt
item.description:
Hey guys. I was having the same issue, and no amount of verifying and reinstalling (from two diff downloads) helped.

In the end I managed to solve it though by simply restarting the game at beginning of Unforseen Consequences and blitzing through to where the crowbar is (didn’t pick anything up - that could be key!) - Now everything works as it should

Awesome game!

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon models don't show
item.dc:creator: Tea23
item.description:
I reinstalled and still have no weapon models.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon models don't show
item.dc:creator: Tromzy
item.description:
I SOLVED that problem by redownloading the mod from an official mirror (the first time it was not an official one) and reinstalling it. The problem is gone !

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon models don't show
item.dc:creator: Tromzy
item.description:
Having the same problem here too. I can shoot, I can hit stuff with the crowbar, but the weapons are invisible. Also I cannot seem to manually reload with the gun.

Windows 7 64 bits, Intel Core i5 3570K, nVidia GeForce GTX 680 with latest drivers.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon models don't show
item.dc:creator: icepiro
item.description:
I have the same issue, no model show for the weapon i actualy have (grenade, pistol and crowbar) and i notice there are no sound when i reload my pistole.

Anyway, guys you did a really great job, i’m impressed, thank you

Read full topic
